topics.body:
I tried writing death metal one time, it was shart.

[spoiler]Decay of the benevolent being. Rise of the malevolent fiend. Stab the womb with the piercing soul. Tainting the fetus with evil. Abortion of benevolence. (It's)  Now tainted with malevolence. Mutated fetus! Fucked up womb, fucked up birth of renewed life! 

Devil's bastard child. Evil's sweet smile. Death for you so facile. Carried in the arms of fate. Pacified with hate.

You tried to renew, but raped by satan. [/spoiler]
